Header: Opposition Leader seeks Indian intervention to expedite new constitution
Content: Opposition Leader and Leader of the Tamil National Alliance, R. Sampanthan said that they expect Indian to expedite the process of introducing a new constitution to Sri Lanka. Following a meeting with visiting Indian Foreign Minister Sushma Swaraj, Sampanthan said that the government was postponing the drafting of a new constitution citing various reasons. The Indian Foreign Minister was in the country to participate in the Indian Ocean Conference.
